text: Following is a table of United States presidential elections in Nebraska, ordered by year. Since its admission to statehood in 1867, Nebraska has participated in every U.S. presidential election. Since 1992 Nebraska has split its electoral votes between congressional districts.270 to win; Nebraska Winners of the state are in bold. {| class="sortable wikitable" |- ! Year !
